profile.description:
I am Software developer with a great focus on creating clean & user friendly code. 

I consider myself as a very passionate person of technologies. I always try to learn something new. I think this is because I do not code just for money or work, especially I do it for hobby because I love it. 

I can develop both frontend and backend using BFF, microservices or GraphQL. Now I am delving into Java development with Spring and Javascript with React and Angular. I am learning languages ​​like PHP and Python with frameworks like Laravel, Wordpress and Django. 
I am also preparing for the Oracle OCA Java 8 certification

fujitsu.title: Fujitsu
fujitsu.subtitle: Full-Stack developer
fujitsu.text: During this time I was developing on Spring boot, Spring data, Spring Rest, JPA, Hibernate, QueryDSL and JUnit for Backend and  React, Redux, CSS3 and HTML5 for Frontend.

workana.title: Workana
workana.subtitle: Freelance developer
workana.text: Development and maintenance of any software customer request.

oesia.title: Grupo Oesia
oesia.subtitle: Java developer
oesia.text: Working on framework based in Java with technologies like Java EE, Java SWT, Spring Boot, JUnit, Mockito, Docker and ImDB (db2).

everisOne.title: Everis Center Seville
everisOne.subtitle: Boot Camp Angular 6
everisOne.text: Learning and practices about Angular during one week.

everisTwo.title: Everis Center Seville
everisTwo.subtitle: Boot Camp .NET
everisTwo.text: Learning and practices about .NET enviroment with C# during two weeks. Working with technologies like SQL Server, ADO.NET, Entity Framework, Linq and ASP.NET.

altair.title: Altair Education Center
altair.subtitle: Application vocational trainning
altair.text:
• Programming on Java, Node.js, Angular & .NET 
• Databases adminstration for SQL (Oracle, MySQL, SQLServer) & NoSQL (MongoDB) 
• Mobile apps development on Android Studio 
• Linux systems & local networks administration.

testimonials.title: testimonials
testimonials.fjr: Marcos is a person who is always researching and looking for new possibilities for a project, a guarantee of always being up to date with the latest technology. Very hardworking when he is passionate about something. Great partner.
testimonials.mco: Passionate about learning and a job well done, a great partner.
testimonials.asc: Great professional, good partner and passionate about technologies.
